name: pangu
description: Paranoid text spacing for good readability, to automatically insert whitespace between CJK (Chinese, Japanese, Korean) and half-width characters (alphabetical letters, numerical digits and symbols).

scripts.pack:chrome: npm run build:browser && cp -rf ./dist/browser/pangu.min.js ./browser_extensions/chrome/vendors/pangu/pangu.min.js && cd ./browser_extensions/chrome/ && zip -q -r -0 ../paranoid-auto-spacing.zip . && zip -j ../paranoid-auto-spacing.zip ~/Dropbox/Projects/paranoid-auto-spacing/key.pem
scripts.pack: npm run pack:chrome && npm run pack:firefox
scripts.clear: npm run clear:shared && npm run clear:browser && npm run clear:node
scripts.build:shared: npm run clear:shared && babel src/shared/ -d dist/shared/
scripts.build:node: npm run clear:node && babel src/node/ -d dist/node/
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:browser && npm run build:node
scripts.test: npm run test:shared && npm run test:browser && npm run test:node
scripts.watch:browser: watch 'npm run test:browser' src/shared src/browser test/browser/
scripts.watch:node: watch 'npm run test:node' src/shared src/node test/node/
scripts.watch:pack: watch 'npm run pack' src/shared src/browser test/browser/
